short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables you to see solace messages directly in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly monitor and manage your Solace queues directly within Chrome

This extension simplifies interacting with Solace PubSub+ by providing a user-friendly interface for:

- Secure Connection: Leverages in-process credentials for secure connection to your Solace broker
- Real-time Message Viewing: Extract and display messages in the "Messages Queued" tab. Expand individual messages for detailed inspection
- Seamless Message Navigation: Navigate through large message volumes with ease using the intuitive built-in pagination within the "Messages Queued" tab
- Live Updates: The extension stays active as long as your browser is open, automatically fetching new messages and integrating them seamlessly into the existing queue, keeping you updated in real-time
- Cluster Flexibility: Switch between Solace clusters with ease, allowing you to monitor multiple environments from a single extension

Benefits:

- Gain real-time insights into message content and flow within your Solace queues
- Simplify debugging and troubleshooting by easily accessing message details
- Enhance productivity with efficient message navigation and automatic updates
- Maintain flexibility by switching between Solace clusters on the fly

Ideal for:

- Developers and system administrators working with Solace PubSub+
- Operations teams monitoring message traffic and health
- nyone who needs a convenient way to interact with Solace queues directly within Chrome

Get started today and experience the ease of managing your Solace infrastructure!

This extension is open-source and available for contributions on GitHub: https://github.com/Valle12/solace-queue-viewer-extension
